pr_title: Add maven/gradle documentation to manual instrumentation instructions.

timeline.message: Add maven/gradle documentation to manual instrumentation instructions.

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks @johnbley, this definitely seems like a nice improvement! The only point I have is this gets us getTracer but for @WithSpan I believe a different annotations dependency is required.
https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-java/tree/master/extensions/auto_annotations
Do you think you can add that too? Or we can follow up in a separate PR, no worries.

+You'll need to add a dependency on the `opentelemetry-api` library to get started.
+
+### Maven
+
+```xml
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>io.opentelemetry</groupId>
+      <artifactId>opentelemetry-api</artifactId>
+      <version>0.7.0</version>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+```
+
+### Gradle
+
+```groovy
+dependencies {
+	compile('io.opentelemetry:opentelemetry-api:0.7.0')
+}
+```
+
